title: Build Storybook
description: Serve up storybook in development mode.

browserTarget.description: Build target to be served in project-name:builder:config format. Should generally target on the builder: '@angular-devkit/build-angular:browser'. Useful for Storybook to use options (styles, assets, ...).

staticDir.description: Directory where to load static files from, array of strings.

outputDir.description: Directory where to store built files.

configDir.description: Directory where to load Storybook configurations from.

loglevel.description: Controls level of logging during build. Can be one of: [silly, verbose, info (default), warn, error, silent].

docs.description: Starts Storybook in documentation mode. Learn more about it : https://storybook.js.org/docs/react/writing-docs/build-documentation#preview-storybooks-documentation.
